name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) with 13+ years of experience in high-performance application delivery in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Python**, **Pytest**, **CI/CD**, and **GitLab CI**, with a focus on automated testing and continuous integration. Demonstrated expertise in leveraging **AWS** services such as **Glue**, **Lambdas**, and **S3** for scalable test solutions. Skilled in data manipulation with **Pandas** and **NumPy**, and in working with databases like **PostgreSQL** and **Clickhouse**. Experience with messaging systems like **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, and performance monitoring tools such as **Prometheus** and **Grafana**.

Adept in implementing microservices and event-driven architectures, with a solid grounding in **Jenkins**, **k8s**, and **ArgoCD** for streamlined workflows. Committed to ensuring compliance with industry standards, including HIPAA and PCI DSS. Proven ability to build AI/ML frameworks utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for automated test environments. Excels in collaborative development practices, leveraging **GitLabCI** and **Sentry** for effective debugging and monitoring.
